name: synchronized
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
happening together, at the same or right time, or in the expected way: The attacks don't appear to be synchronized. Steamboat Willie was the first animated cartoon to use synchronized sound. Each operation is closely synchronised. The female hormonal cycle is finely synchronized with the circulatory system and lymphatic drainage in particular.
(of clocks or watches) having been made to show the same time: NTP is used to keep all of the client and server clocks synchronized. The second hands of numerous synchronised watches reached twelve.
More examplesFewer examplesHe won a gold medal in the synchronized diving. The idea was that, by sensing light at the appropriate time, people could become synchronised to a new time zone.It is assumed that clocks are synchronized to within several minutes.
